message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Alice, that's a bit high for me. I'm interested in the product, but my budget is closer to $10,000. Would you be willing to consider $11,000?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $11,000 is too low for me to consider. This product is truly top-of-the-line and will bring you a lot of value.  How about we meet in the middle at $15,000?
Alice, I understand you have a high-quality product, but $15,000 is still outside my budget.  I'm willing to go up to $12,000.  Let's see if we can make this work.
